meanings.sent1: I enjoy masticating my favorite snacks slowly.
meanings.sent2: He was masticating a delicious sandwich during lunch.
meanings.sent3: The noisy masticating of the crunchy chips made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were masticating on the problem all night long.
meanings.sent5: The sound of masticating echoed through the quiet room.

meanings.sent1: The cow was masticating the grass in the field.
meanings.sent2: She was masticating the tough meat with determination.
meanings.sent3: The loud masticating of the dog's bone woke up the whole house.

meanings.sent5: The old man's jaw was masticating slowly due to his missing teeth.
